textContent:
gcloud projects get-iam-policy PROJECT_ID
gcloud projects add-iam-policy-binding $PROJECT_ID --member=user:N.Boudier.Ph@gmail.com --role=roles/editor
title: policy setup to create CloudSQL db
textContentHtml:
gcloud projects get-iam-policy PROJECT_ID

gcloud projects add-iam-policy-binding $PROJECT_ID --member=user:N.Boudier.Ph@gmail.com --role=roles/editor
